summary: A mysterious woman claiming to be the deceased daughter of a rich man tries to solve the problems of his untrusting son and supposedly mentally handicaped daughter. But one question stands in her way: is she really Caroline?
cast: Stephanie Zimbalist|Pamela Reed|George Grizzard|Patricia Neal|Dorothy McGuire|Shawn Phelan|Jenny Jacobs|Libby Whittemore|John Evans|Barbara Britt|John Bennes|Judith Sullivan|Mary Nell Santacroce|Dan Albright|Warde Q. Butler|Joseph C. Floyd|Marc Gowan|Alice Heffernan-Sneed|Randi Layne|Mark Lee Levitt|Jeff Young Lewis|Audray McCroskey|Afemo Omilami|Shelley Robertson|Lonnie R. Smith Jr.|Tonea Stewart|Bruce Taylor|Laura Whyte|Joseph Sargent
title: Caroline?
